segments.text: We are very interested in your printed pure silk scarves , so could you introduce us your prices ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for inquiring . But your enquiry is too vague to reply .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please send us your best offer and state payment terms and time of shipment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I need to discuss it with our manager . We'll let you have our firm offer next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm waiting . Your early offer will be highly appreciated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I will reply to you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
